org.kaaproject.kaa.client.channel.failover.strategies

Interface FailoverStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFailoverStrategy

    public interface FailoverStrategy
    Failover strategy is responsible for producing failover decisions based on failover statuses.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getBootstrapServersRetryPeriod()
      Use the getTimeUnit() method to get current time unit.
      long getOperationServersRetryPeriod()
      Use the getTimeUnit() method to get current time unit.
      TimeUnit getTimeUnit() 
      FailoverDecision onFailover(FailoverStatus failoverStatus)
      Needs to be invoked to determine a decision that resolves the failover.
      void onRecover(TransportConnectionInfo connectionInfo)
      Needs to be invoked once client recovered after failover.

    • Method Detail

      • onFailover

        FailoverDecision onFailover(FailoverStatus failoverStatus)
        Needs to be invoked to determine a decision that resolves the failover.
        Parameters:
        failoverStatus - current status of the failover.
        Returns:
        decision which is meant to resolve the failover.
        See Also:
        FailoverDecision, FailoverStatus

      • onRecover

        void onRecover(TransportConnectionInfo connectionInfo)
        Needs to be invoked once client recovered after failover.
        Parameters:
        connectionInfo - server information
        See Also:
        TransportConnectionInfo

      • getBootstrapServersRetryPeriod

        long getBootstrapServersRetryPeriod()
        Use the getTimeUnit() method to get current time unit.
        Returns:
        period of time after which will be made attempt to tweak bootstrap service.

      • getOperationServersRetryPeriod

        long getOperationServersRetryPeriod()
        Use the getTimeUnit() method to get current time unit.
        Returns:
        period of time after which will be made attempt to tweak operation server.

      • getTimeUnit

        TimeUnit getTimeUnit()
        Returns:
        time unit used within a scope of current failover strategy.
